meanings.definition: Present or proffer (something) for (someone) to accept or reject as desired.
meanings.sent1: I will offer you a cookie.
meanings.sent2: She offered her help to the new student.
meanings.sent3: The cat offered a toy mouse as a gift.
meanings.sent4: The sun offered its warm rays to the chilly morning.
meanings.sent5: He offered a kind smile to brighten her day.

meanings.definition: An act of offering something for acceptance.
meanings.sent1: The offer of a free sample attracted many customers.
meanings.sent2: She received a job offer from the company.
meanings.sent3: The offer of a high-five was met with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The offer of friendship was like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The generous offer made her day brighter.

meanings.definition: An expression of readiness to do or give something if desired.
meanings.sent1: His offer to help with the project was appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The offer to babysit came at just the right time.
meanings.sent3: The offer of a dance was unexpected but fun.
meanings.sent4: Her offer to listen was like a soothing balm.
meanings.sent5: The offer of a ride home was a relief after a long day.
